title: Based on the information presented, which of the

content.prompt: Based on the information presented, which of the following best explains the difference in phenotype between Tay-Sachs carriers and homozygous recessive individuals?

choices.label: Tay-Sachs carriers received a vaccination that homozygous recessive individuals did not receive.
Tay-Sachs carriers inherited an extra chromosome that homozygous recessive individuals did not inherit.
Tay-Sachs carriers have access to a critical nutrient that homozygous recessive individuals did not inherit.
Tay-Sachs carriers synthesize an essential enzyme that homozygous recessive individuals cannot synthesize.

skill.text: 6.D: Explain the relationship between experimental results and larger biological concepts, processes, or theories.
